title: An Atlas of American Gun Violence
alt: Map of shooting incidents in Brooklyn.
info: Using a dataset provided by Gun Violence Archive, I built this interactive map of more than 150,000 shooting incidents spanning five years. To tackle the challenge of smoothly mapping that many points, I used the incredibly performant deck.gl library along with Mapbox, React, and Redux. A search feature shows users the number of shootings in their vicinity by linking the Mapbox geocoding API with Turf.js's geospatial analysis technologies. I did a Q&A about this project that was published on Mapbox's Points of Interest blog.
